Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells typically operate at temperatures of about 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: At these temperatures only ceramic interconnects such as LaCrO3 can be employed.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The development of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) can potentially bring about reduced manufacturing costs as it makes possible the use of an inexpensive ferritic stainless steel (STS) interconnector.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: However, the STS suffers from Cr2O3 scale formation and a peeling-off phenomenon at the IT-SOFC operating temperature in an oxidizing atmosphere.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Application of an oxidation protective coating is an effective means of providing oxidation resistance.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: In this study, we coated an oxidation protective layer on ferritic stainless steel using a precursor solution prepared from lanthanum nitrate, ethylene glycol, and nitric acid.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Heating the precursor solution at 80 degrees C yielded a spinable solution for coating.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: A gel film was coated on a STS substrate by a dip coating technique.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: At the early stage of the heat-treatment, lanthanum-containing oxides such as La2O3 and La2CrO6 formed, and as the heat-treatment temperature was increased, an oxidation protective perovskite-type LaCrO3 layer was produced by the reaction between the lanthanum-containing oxide and the Cr2O3 scale on the SUS substrate.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: As the concentration of La-containing precursor solution was increased, the amount of La2O3 and La2CrO6 phases was gradually increased.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The coating layer, which was prepared from a precursor solution of 0.8 M, was composed of LaCrO3 and small amounts of (Mn,Cr)O-4 spinel.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: A relatively dense coating layer without pin-holes was obtained by heating the gel coating layer at 1073 K for 2 h. Microstructures and oxidation behavior of the La2O3-coated STS444 were investigated.
Titulo: Lanthanum oxide-coated stainless steel for bipolar plates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)
